meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>forehead</radical> is the <radical>origin</radical> for the <radical>measurement</radical> for your <kanji>crown</kanji>! If you measure somewhere else on your head for a crown it won't fit.
readingMnemonic: You want your <kanji>crown</kanji> to be just like Genghis <reading>Khan</reading>'s (かん), which was more of a cap. He's your hero though, because he ruled over the most people, so you want yours to match his measurements.
